name: Lockpick King
description:
A small lockpicking minigame to practice my Unity skills. [Controls]
  • Mouse controls bobby pin angle.
  • Space controls turning the lock.
  • Use the mouse to angle the bobby pin, and space to test the angle.
  • Watch your bobby pin durability at the bottom!
  • Difficulty dynamically adjusts to your skill, but this system still needs work.
  • May be various bugs, sorry!

If you want your high score to save, cookies may have to be enabled for Itch.io

Good luck!
